about_the_game:
"Qwee-0 here, communication and navigation drone from Cyra and the Beacon Path (which, in my ever so humble opinion, ought to have been called Qwee-0’s Grand Adventure... A missed opportunity if ever I saw one!). In this challenging platformer, embark on an intergalactic mission as Cyra and unravel the mystery of your father’s disappearance.

“Encounter seven distinctive planets each with their own unique environment and hazards to boost, dash, run, jump, slide and bounce your way through. And for those overachievers among you, there is a speed-challenge mode. How exciting!

"As you take on the increasingly difficult levels, do keep your 'sensors' peeled for valuable collectables. You never know when they may come in handy!

“And most importantly, find out what happened to Cyra’s father who left on a mission to establish communication beacons across the galaxy but never returned. Journey from beacon to beacon as you gather information and encounter diverse lifeforms along the way. With each step, uncover more about Dr. Kallis and the beacons themselves. Could there be more to the beacons than what meets the eye?

“I dare say, there is no shortage of adventure and challenge on this mission!”

Test your skills against challenging levels whose difficulty increases at just the right rate to keep you coming back for more

Explore new worlds and encounter new creatures across seven distinctive planets.
